mapper.select: SELECT id, uid, content, title, publish, cdt FROM ii_blogs
SELECT id, uid, content, title, publish, cdt FROM ii_blogs WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, uid, content, title, publish, cdt FROM ii_blogs WHERE uid = #{uid}
SELECT b.*, IFNULL((bm.uid = #{uid}), false) AS bookmark FROM ii_blogs b LEFT JOIN ii_bookmarks bm ON b.id = bm.blog_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ii_blogs(uid, title, content, category_id, state) VALUES (#{uid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{categoryId}, #{state})
